p: Most of the participants of the FGDs and IDIs indicated that CHIKV and DENV are transmitted by infected mosquitoes. However, some of the participants reported that CHIKV was also transmitted via air, unhygienic conditions, water or contact with an infected individual. These results are in line with the published results of the quantitative survey [ 39]. From the participantâ€™s narratives, we extracted the following shared culture-bound perceived etiologies: all viruses are the same, a virus is contagious, and something contagious is transmitted via contact with an infected person, air or water.
